headline.print_headline: Times Square Characters Upset at 'Hostile' Police
headline.main: Times Square Characters Upset at 'Hostile' Police

docs.snippet: Some costumed characters in Times Square ripped off their mammoth heads on Tuesday, showing their real faces to protest what they call a "hostile move" by police telling tourists they don't have to tip for photos....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some costumed characters in Times Square ripped off their mammoth heads on Tuesday, showing their real faces to protest what they call a "hostile move" by police telling tourists they don't have to tip for photos.

headline.print_headline: Mexico Says Mine Firm Lied About Chemical Spill
headline.main: Mexico Says Mine Firm Lied About Chemical Spill

docs.snippet: Mexico's top environmental official said Tuesday that a mining company lied about a spill of millions of gallons of acids and heavy metals that contaminated two rivers and a dam downstream....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's top environmental official said Tuesday that a mining company lied about a spill of millions of gallons of acids and heavy metals that contaminated two rivers and a dam downstream.

headline.print_headline: UN Ebola Coordinator to Visit West Africa
headline.main: UN Ebola Coordinator to Visit West Africa

docs.snippet: The public health expert coordinating U.N. efforts to fight Ebola said on Tuesday that he's heading to Washington and then to West Africa to determine the best ways the world body can support people, communities and governments affected by the dea...
docs.lead_paragraph: The public health expert coordinating U.N. efforts to fight Ebola said on Tuesday that he's heading to Washington and then to West Africa to determine the best ways the world body can support people, communities and governments affected by the deadly disease.

headline.print_headline: Beloved New York Bar Wins Reprieve From Wrecking Ball
headline.main: Beloved New York Bar Wins Reprieve From Wrecking Ball

docs.snippet: Owners of the 77-year-old Subway Inn, a New York bar where celebrities like Marilyn Monroe and Joe DiMaggio once mingled, won a court order on Tuesday temporarily blocking their imminent eviction from the site, the business said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Owners of the 77-year-old Subway Inn, a New York bar where celebrities like Marilyn Monroe and Joe DiMaggio once mingled, won a court order on Tuesday temporarily blocking their imminent eviction from the site, the business said.

docs.snippet: A Powerball ticket sold in West Virginia that was worth $1 million from the Feb. 11 drawing has gone unclaimed....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Powerball ticket sold in West Virginia that was worth $1 million from the Feb. 11 drawing has gone unclaimed.

headline.print_headline: Calpers Set to Allow 100 Extra Pay Types Count Toward Pensions
headline.main: Calpers Set to Allow 100 Extra Pay Types Count Toward Pensions

docs.snippet: The California Public Employees' Retirement System (Calpers), America's largest public pension fund, is expected to approve nearly 100 types of extra pay on Wednesday that will count toward how pensions are calculated for newly hired workers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The California Public Employees' Retirement System (Calpers), America's largest public pension fund, is expected to approve nearly 100 types of extra pay on Wednesday that will count toward how pensions are calculated for newly hired workers.

headline.print_headline: Mahan Wants to Stay in Hunt for Stretch Drive
headline.main: Mahan Wants to Stay in Hunt for Stretch Drive

docs.snippet: The swing was efficient as ever, and the ball soared toward the far end of the range with a tight draw as Hunter Mahan held his pose....
docs.lead_paragraph: The swing was efficient as ever, and the ball soared toward the far end of the range with a tight draw as Hunter Mahan held his pose.

headline.print_headline: Ghana Company Launches Country's First 4G Data Network
headline.main: Ghana Company Launches Country's First 4G Data Network

docs.snippet: Ghana company Surfline Communications launched the country's first 4G data network on Tuesday in partnership with French technology company Alcatel-Lucent, making Ghana the sixth nation in sub-Saharan Africa to get the high speed service....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ghana company Surfline Communications launched the country's first 4G data network on Tuesday in partnership with French technology company Alcatel-Lucent, making Ghana the sixth nation in sub-Saharan Africa to get the high speed service.

headline.print_headline: Rail Safety Must Be Priority After Lac-Mégantic Disaster: Mayor
headline.main: Rail Safety Must Be Priority After Lac-Mégantic Disaster: Mayor

docs.snippet: It was the final report that was supposed to bring closure to this small town after an explosive train derailment claimed 47 lives and ignited a North American debate on the transport of crude by rail....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was the final report that was supposed to bring closure to this small town after an explosive train derailment claimed 47 lives and ignited a North American debate on the transport of crude by rail.
